commit.message: en: Avoid ambiguous language regarding when transactions confirm

files.patch:
@@ -674,7 +674,7 @@ Value estimatefee(const Array& params, bool fHelp)
         throw runtime_error(
             "estimatefee nblocks
"
             "
Estimates the approximate fee per kilobyte
"
-            "needed for a transaction to get confirmed
"
+            "needed for a transaction to begin confirmation
"
             "within nblocks blocks.
"
             "
Arguments:
"
             "1. nblocks     (numeric)
"
@@ -706,7 +706,7 @@ Value estimatepriority(const Array& params, bool fHelp)
         throw runtime_error(
             "estimatepriority nblocks
"
             "
Estimates the approximate priority
"
-            "a zero-fee transaction needs to get confirmed
"
+            "a zero-fee transaction needs to begin confirmation
"
             "within nblocks blocks.
"
             "
Arguments:
"
             "1. nblocks     (numeric)
"
